dialogue.text: (I wonder why everyone's so interested in rap these days...)
The suspect I'm looking for was reportedly spotted in this very area, alongside you!
Really, now? I come here often, so I'm not quite sure I know who you're talking about. Do you have a description?
We're uh... usually better at our jobs than this. We weren't given a lot of information to begin with.
That's fine. I'm sure I can probably help you figure a few things out by the end of this.
